content.header: Better visual hierarchy for readability (i.e. margins, centralized view)
content.response: I added margins and centered the images in my project so that readers know where to look exactly and for better readability.
I added sentences describing the motivation behind the design of my personas and for each section to engage the readers more.

While initially I tried to add a lot of details to enhance empathy for my personas, it seemed to have detract from the actual user experience I was trying to design. So I removed a lot of the back story, particularly for Sam who was originally a tenured professor playing Skyrim and planning a trip to Hawaii.
I added sentences describing the motivation behind the design of my personas and for each section to engage the readers more.
